Name: Hublot
Description: A luxury watch brand owned by Bernard Arnaults company, LVMH
Reason: The owner of Hublot's parent company, LVMH, Bernard Arnault invests hundreds of millions in Israeli companies
How to Boycott: Don't buy Hublot products. Don't sell Hublot products. Don't work for Hublot or LVMH.

Name: Tiffany & Co.
Description: A fashion brand owned by Bernard Arnaults company, LVMH
Reason: The owner of Tiffany & Co.'s parent company, LVMH, Bernard Arnault invests hundreds of millions in Israeli companies
